name: Puppy Training Package
description: A basic training package for puppies, focusing on essential commands and socialization skills.

name: Obedience Training Package
description: An intermediate training course to improve obedience and reinforce good behavior in adult dogs.

name: Advanced Tricks Training Package
description: An advanced course teaching fun and impressive tricks, suitable for dogs who have mastered basic commands.

name: Behavioral Training Package
description: A specialized training package to address specific behavioral issues and improve overall temperament.

name: Agility Training Package
description: A high-energy course for dogs to learn agility skills, including obstacle courses and speed training.
